title: Which was the best 80’s TV show which stands the test of time and is still good on a re-run? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Golden Girls, Mash, Chips, LA Law, Night Court, Alf, Three’s Company, Family Ties, Miami Vice, Hill Street Blues, Who’s the Boss, The Wonder Years, Magnum PI, Knight Rider, Happy Days, Laverne and Shirley, A -Team, Murphy Brown, The Love Boat, Moonlighting, The Simpsons, Taxi, Growing Pains, Facts of Life, SNL, Full House, Dukes of Hazard, Mork and Mindy ,The Jeffersons , Simon and Simon and Cheers. There’s others. Search Google for more eighties TV shows.
